4317860.name: NekoBrowser: The Anime Player
4317860.description:
Discover the World of Anime in a New Dimension

NekoBrowser is more than just a standard browser – it’s your personal command center built by fans, for fans. Forget about hundreds of open tabs and losing track of where you left off. NekoBrowser integrates everything you need to enjoy your favorite series both online and locally.

KEY FEATURES

  • NekoPlayer: A smart player that automatically syncs your progress, allows for lightning-fast navigation between episodes, and lets you search for series across supported sites.

  • Anime Library Manager: Full control over your collection. The app remembers the exact episode and minute you finished on, letting you jump back into the action with a single click.

  • Advanced AdBlock: Enjoy a clean, aesthetic web experience without annoying ads. Our filter not only blocks intrusive content but also intelligently fills the empty spaces they leave behind.

  • Full Customization: Express yourself! Choose between Dark and Light modes, customize accent colors, and set your own backgrounds with adjustable brightness and saturation.

YOUR COMMAND CENTER

  • Sidebar: Intuitive access to your history, favorite sites, file manager, and a "Random Anime" feature for when you don’t know what to watch.

  • Smart Sessions: The app restores all your open tabs upon restart, ensuring a seamless transition between work and entertainment.

  • Security & Privacy: Browse the web with peace of mind. Focus on discovering new series while NekoBrowser handles your protection. Enjoy full control with selective cookie management for every domain.

WHY NEKOBROWSER?

  • For Collectors: Full-screen manager for all your saved series.

  • For Comfort: Automatically launch episodes directly from the series page.

  • For Esthetes: Custom title bar and a sleek, modern interface design.

Join our growing community and transform the way you experience anime!
